title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Developing Cognitive Load Measurement Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Cognitive Load Theory (CLT) and foundational knowledge of educational psychology
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service science teachers to evaluate actual learning materials and develop cognitive load measurement tools

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three types of cognitive load: intrinsic, extraneous, and germane.
Learners can measure the cognitive load of learning materials by applying informed rating and naïve rating strategies.
Learners can develop and validate systematic evaluation tools for over 24 science learning contexts/materials.

resources: 24 Sets of Science Learning Material Samples
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
